pr_title: [Dialogue] Part 4: Runtime Configuration and ETE Testing

timeline.bodyText: I worry that lists of test suites like this will very quickly get out of sync with the c-j-r versions. Maybe OK if we can burn down the migration pretty fast, but i think if it takes longer than 2 weeks then this copy&pasting might be too much of a risk
timeline.author: iamdanfox

replies.bodyText: This is a valid concern - though the rate at which AtlasDB's ETE test classes change is incredibly slow (for instance, this class was last changed in February 2019) so I wouldn't be too worried.
replies.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: (And of course once the migration is done the non-Dialogue versions will go)
replies.author: jeremyk-91
